attributes.action: Shut down non-essential facilities and close UK borders for two weeks.
attributes.additional_details: To protect at-risk groups from the spread of COVID-19 and to minimise the damage from the pandemic.
attributes.background: Close UK borders for both air and land travel, schools, universities, and workplaces, as well as other public places with the exception of supermarkets/smaller grocery stores, as well as important facilities such as power stations, water supply stations, etc. for two weeks.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301397

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
